# region

**Instance Property**

The region used to determine when the system sends the notification.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var region: CLRegion { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreLocation/CLRegion/notifyOnEntry] and [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreLocation/CLRegion/notifyOnExit] properties of this region to specify whether the system sends notifications when the user enters or exits the specified geographic area.
